EnteringHaven_Trespassing.synopsis: A player got spotted by an NPC as they were trespassing without Jaheira's premission in Haven.

DouseTorch.synopsis: Darkness causes death in SCL. As such, Haven npcs consider dousing torches as a crime. This crime has one warning.
DouseTorch.how_to_trigger: Load into SCL, go to Haven, douse one of stationary torches in front of an npc.

automatic_ordering.reasoning: Upon examining the two sessions, no explicit cause‐and‐effect or sequential dependency is apparent. 'EnteringHaven_Trespassing' is triggered when the player is caught trespassing without proper permission in Haven, while 'DouseTorch' is triggered when the player commits the act of dousing a torch in front of an NPC. Both require actions within Haven but they do not logically depend on each other, nor are they mutually exclusive as each represents a separate criminal act in the game. Hence, there are no ordering or exclusiveness constraints between these sessions.

EnteringHaven_Trespassing_0.speaker: Narrator
EnteringHaven_Trespassing_0.text: *You haven't got permission to remain here; now you'll need to defend yourself.*

EnteringHaven_Trespassing_1.speaker: Narrator
EnteringHaven_Trespassing_1.text: *You won't be asked again - you'll need to get permission to walk freely in this place.*

EnteringHaven_Trespassing_2.speaker: Narrator
EnteringHaven_Trespassing_2.text: *You've been caught sneaking around. Someone with authority will have to grant you safe passage.*

EnteringHaven_Trespassing_3.speaker: Narrator
EnteringHaven_Trespassing_3.text: *You've been caught sneaking around. But the people here have more important things to worry about - as long as you don't cause any trouble.*

DouseTorch_0.speaker: Narrator
DouseTorch_0.text: *The denizens of Last Light are fed up with your reckless torch-dousing in the face of the shadow curse.*

DouseTorch_1.speaker: Narrator
DouseTorch_1.text: *Beware - this is the only warning you'll get in Last Light about the crime of dousing a torch.*

DouseTorch_2.speaker: Narrator
DouseTorch_2.text: *Where torches protect mortal souls from a shadow curse, dousing one is considered a crime.*
